BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Prelude.Testbench.assert'
BlackBox.type:
assert :: (Eq a,Show a) -- (ARG[0],ARG[1])
        => SClock t      -- ^ ARG[2]
        -> String        -- ^ ARG[3]
        -> Signal' t a   -- ^ Checked value (ARG[4])
        -> Signal' t a   -- ^ Expected value (ARG[5])
        -> Signal' t b   -- ^ Return valued (ARG[6])
        -> Signal' t b
